search_results.snippet:
Herman Wouk is an American author, whose best-selling 1951 novel The Caine 
Mutiny won the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction. His other works include the highly 
acclaimed The Winds of War and War and Remembrance, historical novels about 
World War II, and non-fiction such as This Is My God, ... His books have been 
translated into 27 languages.
